item.description: Biography I am a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Qualcomm AI Research, USA. Before joining Qualcomm, I have worked at Wins Lab, Lehigh University under the advisement of Professor Mooi Choo Chuah.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Artificial Intelligence Theory and Practice (CSE327), Lehigh University Instructor: Prof. Jeff Heflin Teaching Assistant Spring 2018 Data Analytics Smart Cities (CSE498), Lehigh University Instructor: Professor Mooi Choo Chuah Gave a Tutorial about Deep Learning. Fall 2017 Computer Organization and Architecture (CSE202), Lehigh University Instructor: Prof. Jason Loew Teaching Assistant Spring 2017
